TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MicrophoneInfo extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Class providing information on a microphone.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns The "address" string of the microphone that corresponds to the address returned by AudioDeviceInfo#getAddress()
Docs.value: the address of the microphone

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a android.util.Pair list for channel mapping, which indicating how this microphone is used by each channels or a capture stream.
Docs.value: a android.util.Pair list for channel mapping

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MicrophoneChannelMapping ChannelMappingDirect = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MicrophoneChannelMapping enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: The channel contains raw audio from this microphone.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MicrophoneChannelMapping ChannelMappingProcessed = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MicrophoneChannelMapping enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: The channel contains processed audio from this microphone and possibly another microphone.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies the device.
Docs.value: the description of the microphone

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the directionality of microphone.
Docs.value: the directionality of microphone

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Microphone directionality type: omni.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MicrophoneDirectionality DirectionalityUnknown = (0)

Docs.summary: Returns a android.util.Pair list of frequency responses.
Docs.value: the frequency response of the microphone

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns A device group id that can be used to group together microphones on the same peripheral, attachments or logical groups.
Docs.value: the group of the microphone or #GROUP_UNKNOWN if the group is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value used for when the group of the microphone is unknown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns The system unique device ID that corresponds to the id returned by AudioDeviceInfo#getId().
Docs.value: the microphone's id

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns unique index for device within its group.
Docs.value: the microphone's index in its group or #INDEX_IN_THE_GROUP_UNKNOWN if the index in the group is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value used for when the index in the group of the microphone is unknown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: To be added.

Docs.summary: Returns the location of the microphone.
Docs.value: the location of the microphone

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MicrophoneLocation LocationMainbody = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MicrophoneLocation enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: A microphone that locate on main body of the device.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MicrophoneLocation enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: A microphone that locate on a movable main body of the device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MicrophoneLocation LocationPeripheral = (3)

Docs.summary: A microphone that locate on a peripheral.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MicrophoneLocation LocationUnknown = (0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MicrophoneLocation enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: A microphone that the location is unknown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the level in dB of the maximum SPL supported by the device at 1000Hz.
Docs.value: the maximum level in dB or #SPL_UNKNOWN if maximum SPL is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the level in dB of the minimum SPL that can be registered by the device at 1000Hz.
Docs.value: the minimum level in dB or #SPL_UNKNOWN if minimum SPL is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns A Coordinate3F object that represents the orientation of microphone.
Docs.value: the orientation of the microphone or #ORIENTATION_UNKNOWN if orientation is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value used for when the orientation of the microphone is unknown.
Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns A Coordinate3F object that represents the geometric location of microphone in meters.
Docs.value: the geometric location of the microphone or #POSITION_UNKNOWN if the geometric location is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value used for when the position of the microphone is unknown.
Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the level in dBFS produced by a 1000Hz tone at 94 dB SPL.
Docs.value: the sensitivity of the microphone or #SENSITIVITY_UNKNOWN if the sensitivity is unknown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value used for when the sensitivity of the microphone is unknown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value used for when the SPL of the microphone is unknown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
